recipe_name: Free-form trifle with berries and custard
author: Nigel Slater
method: Bring the raspberries, blackberries and blueberries to the boil in a saucepan with the sugar and a little water. Simmer for a few minutes until the fruits burst. Set aside. Slice the sponge cake into thin pieces and place these in a bowl or in four individual soup plates. Spoon over the warm fruits and some of their syrup. Trickle over the custard and, if you wish, dust with icing sugar.
ingredients: 500g/17½oz mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, blackberries),  3 tbsp sugar, or more to taste,  splash water,  500g/17½oz ready-made plain sponge cake,  250ml/9fl oz ready-made custard,  icing sugar, to serve (optional)
